img.alt: File:Flag of Vietnam.svg

div.p: Flag_of_Vietnam.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,800 × 1,200 pixels, file size: 624 B)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

td.span: Flag of Vietnam.svg
td.div: 한국어: 윁남의 국기 / 越南의 國旗
ລາວ: ທຸງຊາດຂອງປະເທດຫວຽດນາມ

span.b: မြန်မာဘာသာ:

span.style: font-family:Padauk, Parabaik, Myanmar3, Myanmar2, Myanmar1, MyMyanmar

div.span: ဗီယက်နမ်နိုင်ငံ၏ အလံတော်

a.title: th:ธงชาติเวียดนาม

div.a: ธงชาติเวียดนาม

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

td.p: Lưu Ly vẽ lại theo nguồn trên

td.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; font-weight: bold

td.div: Tiếng Việt: Đối với Việt Nam Dân chủ Cộng hòa (Bắc Việt) từ năm 1955 đến 1976, xin hãy dùng hình File:Flag_of_North_Vietnam.svg.
English: For Democratic Republic of Vietnam (North Vietnam) purposes between 1955 and 1976 please use the File:Flag_of_North_Vietnam.svg.
Français : Pour la République démocratique du Vietnam (Vietnam du Nord) fins entre 1955 et 1976 s'il vous plaît utiliser le File:Flag_of_North_Vietnam.svg.
中文: 對於越南民主共和國（北越）1955至1976年，请使用File:Flag_of_North_Vietnam.svg.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

img.alt: Public domain

span.i: I, the copyright holder of this work, hereby release it into the public domain. This applies worldwide.

span.small: In case this is not legally possible:
span.i: I grant anyone the right to use this work for any purpose, without any conditions, unless such conditions are required by law.

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 05:34, 5 August 2010

td.span: (Reduce code)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:22, 5 August 2010

td.span: (yellow)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:21, 5 August 2010

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 06:29, 11 June 2010)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 19:30, 11 June 2010

td.span: (Kept new colors, but kept previous code. Need to see what the TCVN says about flag colors.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 19:25, 11 June 2010

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 06:06, 11 June 2010 pictures of actual flag, since you're unsure of the colours yourself, until we have citation, pics are all we have)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:29, 11 June 2010

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 09:20, 13 May 2010 (no citation for colors))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:06, 11 June 2010

td.span: (colours)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 09:20, 13 May 2010

td.span: (Finally got my hands on "TCVN 2242:1977 - National flag of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam. Flag made of textile materials." I made the flag drawing exact to their specifications, I am still not certain about the specific colors. Given the document is V)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:41, 2 December 2009

td.span: (I cleaned up your fixed version, pay attention)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:39, 2 December 2009

td.span: (I told you last time I fixed the star points to get rid of a matrix transform. Each element has their own line? Happy?)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:37, 2 December 2009

td.span: ((I'd be impressed if you could find one other person that thinks this isn't a…) cleanup (again))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:24, 2 December 2009

td.span: (Ok, non broken version this time)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 03:41, 2 December 2009

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 16:20, 1 December 2009 (that is not cleanup))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 23:47, 1 December 2009

td.span: (cleanup)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 16:20, 1 December 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 19:36, 8 August 2009

td.span: (Reduced code)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 02:24, 16 June 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 03:34, 7 June 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 03:32, 7 June 2009

td.span: (thay màu)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 03:28, 7 June 2009

td.span: (Thay đổi màu cờ theo tài liệu ""Tìm hiểu các văn bản pháp luật về nghi lễ, nghi thức, trang phục áp dụng trong cơ quan nhà nước và doanh nghiệp", NXB Lao động Xã hội 2003, trang 12" (đỏ tươi, vàng tươi))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:48, 15 July 2006

td.span: (recode; exact star, dimensions from http://www.flag.de/FOTW/flags/vn.html, colours from http://www.vexilla-mundi.com/vietnam.htm)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:27, 28 April 2006

td.span: (Reverted to earlier revision)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 13:58, 28 April 2006

td.span: (Auf eine alte Version zurückgesetzt)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:44, 17 February 2006

td.span: (rewritten with more accurate star, same license)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 13:05, 5 February 2006

td.span: (Pantone 186 C for red, 116 C for yellow (source: http://www.vexilla-mundi.com/vietnam.htm))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:23, 17 December 2005

td.span: (Fixed red background, composed everything in notepad)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 08:07, 23 October 2005

td.span: (The national flag of Vietnam. Category:SVG flags)
